ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
openmpi:
- '5'
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: Resolves complex metagenomic mixtures by analysing deep sequencing data, using a mixture model based approach. The use of parallel Monte Carlo Markov chains for the exploration of the species space enables the identification of the set of species more likely to contribute to the mixture.

Resolves complex metagenomic mixtures by analysing deep sequencing data, using a mixture model based approach. The use of parallel Monte Carlo Markov chains for the exploration of the species space enables the identification of the set of species more likely to contribute to the mixture.

name: r-metamix

about.summary: Resolves complex metagenomic mixtures by analysing deep sequencing data, using a mixture model based approach. The use of parallel Monte Carlo Markov chains for the exploration of the species space enables the identification of the set of species more likely to contribute to the mixture.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-metamix
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/metaMix_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/metaMix/metaMix_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1818a61c459d3672c24082df523d88175042805bf7e2ed971f66971fd3e3139f

build:
  number: 4
  # Checking windows to see if it passes. Uncomment the line if it fails.
  skip: true  # [win]

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}          # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-rmpi
    - r-data.table >=1.9.2
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gtools
    - openmpi

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-rmpi
    - r-data.table >=1.9.2
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gtools

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('metaMix')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('metaMix')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=metaMix
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Resolves complex metagenomic mixtures by analysing deep sequencing data, using a mixture
    model based approach. The use of parallel Monte Carlo Markov chains for the exploration
    of the species space enables the identification of the set of species more likely
    to contribute to the mixture.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - sarah-buddle

# Package: metaMix
# Title: Bayesian Mixture Analysis for Metagenomic Community Profiling
# Version: 0.3
# Author: Sofia Morfopoulou <sofia.morfopoulou.10@ucl.ac.uk>
# Maintainer: Sofia Morfopoulou <sofia.morfopoulou.10@ucl.ac.uk>
# Depends: R (>= 3.2)
# Imports: data.table (>= 1.9.2), Matrix, gtools, Rmpi, ggplot2
# Suggests: knitr
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Description: Resolves complex metagenomic mixtures by analysing deep sequencing data, using a mixture model based approach. The use of parallel Monte Carlo Markov chains for the exploration of the species space enables the identification of the set of species more likely to contribute to the mixture.
# License: GPL-3
# LazyData: true
# SystemRequirements: Open MPI (>=1.4.3)
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2019-02-07 15:41:40 UTC; sophia
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-02-11 16:20:03 UTC
